bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Guide for Recommended Electrical Clearances and Insulation Levels in Air Insulated Electrical Power Substations
IEEE Approved Draft Guide for Recommended Electrical Clearances and Insulation Levels in Air Insulated Electrical Power Substations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide, covering three-phase ac systems from 1 kV to 800 kV, provides recommended electrical operating, safety clearances, and insulation levels in air-insulated electric supply substations; addresses insulation coordination procedures; provides design procedures for the selection and coordination of the insulation levels within the station as they relate to substation clearances; and addresses how reduced clearances in high-voltage ac substations will allow for compact bus arrangements and substation voltage uprating applications.
